pkgmetadata.longdescription: PowerShell Core is a cross-platform automation and configuration tool/framework that works well with your existing tools and is optimized for dealing with structured data (e.g. JSON, CSV, XML, etc.), REST APIs, and object models. It includes a command-line shell, an associated scripting language and a framework for processing cmdlets.

use.flag: Install a pwsh symlink that points to pwsh-bin.
